functions.name: filestore_access_control_enforce_identity
functions.description: Checks if filestore access control enforces identity in Datastore.

functions.name: filestore_access_points_enforce_user_identity
functions.description: Checks if filestore access points enforce user identity in Datastore.

functions.name: filestore_access_control_enforce_user_identity
functions.description: Checks if filestore access control enforces user identity in Datastore.

functions.name: firestore_datastore_tls_enabled
functions.description: Checks if TLS is enabled for Firestore Datastore.

functions.name: firestore_datastore_audit_logging_enabled
functions.description: Checks if audit logging is enabled for Firestore Datastore.

functions.name: logging_firestore_datastore_audit_logs_enabled
functions.description: Checks if audit logs are enabled for Firestore Datastore in logging.

notes: All functions are based on GCP DATASTORE API.
Ensure proper IAM permissions are configured.
Consider regional vs global service differences.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
